means.word_mean: 1. a member of a group of North American Indian peoples who spoke a Siouan language and who ranged from Lake Michigan to the Rocky Mountains
2. a family of North American Indian languages spoken by the Sioux
1. of or relating to the Sioux people or their language and culture
